title: willi9974
author: willi9974
created_time: June 23, 2022, 09:33:26 AMLast edit: April 04, 2023, 11:12:48 AM by willi9974
content: Hello all,here a short gambling game --> Bitcoin Cow Patty BingoRules:- The Cow is a to defined block number after the 9 fields are filled up- You can pic one or more Bitcoin Cow Patty Bingo fields - Each field cost 0.001 BTC - From the 10 fields are 9 in the game (all goes to the winner)- From the 10 fields are 1 no winner fields (all goes to the bank)- If the bank wins the pot, the amount will be donated regionally to needy people- The Cow field will be located in the hash value from the block and must be the complete field number, beginning from the right sight- If the hash value does not contain a complete field number like 02 / 05 / ..., the next block is used, etc...Example:Hash 0000000000000000000879f11e2671bac8d491b69f0dbac5046808eb9fe2c872 --> Winner is field 08Paymend:- If you want to play, first post your BTC Cow Field number(s) and your BTC return address- After your post send the coins to the BTC address bc1qcv7asqnevtwqj5m0qjxj0v8y2d28mxha9aftrc (0.001 BTC per field) and then edit your post or replay with your TX IDBitcoin Cow Patty:Code:BTC Cow field 01BTC Cow field 02BTC Cow field 03BTC Cow field 04 DeepMining76BTC Cow field 05BTC Cow field 06BTC Cow field 07BTC Cow field 08 Buchi-88BTC Cow field 09 Willi9974BTC Cow field 10 iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc2The first booked 9 numbers are member fields and the last field will be the bank. Please poste your wanted "Bitcoin Cow Patty field number", your "TX ID" and your "BTC return address" to send the jackpot back, if you are the winner.Template:Code:User: your usernameField: your Bitcoin Cow Patty BingoTX ID: your TX IDReturn address:  your address if you win the jackpotAnd now I hope you like it a little bit to gamble and keep your fingers crossed all!Best regardsWilli
